name: THE ADVENTURES OF BLOB GUY II
name_original: THE ADVENTURES OF BLOB GUY II
description:
This game was made just for fun and i will never make a blob guy game that you will need to pay for. This game was made by me.

Fun fact: The original name of this game was not Blob guy 2! It's old name was actually Blob guy GOLD.

Anyways, enjoy the game! 😋
